task.title: Installing a Stage Library
task.shortdesc:
You can install a stage library by downloading the library and untarring it into the
installation directory.

step.cmd: Download the stage library tar file to a directory in the machine where the is installed.
Untar the file to the installation directory.
step.info: For example, if you downloaded the stage library to your home directory and installed the in the opt/local directory, you might use the following commands to untar a stage library:$ cd /opt/local $ tar xvf ~/streamsets-datacollector-<stage_library>.tar.gz

taskbody.result: The stages from the stage library are now available in the .
